document_data.name: Bosco's Bilge
document_data.mainbody: '''Bosco's Bilge''' was a tavern found in [[Jahaka Anchorage]], the pirate bay located within the [[Jahaka Bay]] in western [[Chult]]. It was named after and run by [[Bosco Daggerhand]].
document_data.Description: The Bilge stunk of stale tobacco and spoiled food.
document_data.Services: Though the quality was low, the tavern offered a limited variety of dishes, including [[shark]] and jungle [[snake]]. It catered to the various Jahaka pirate crews.
